name: Hotel les Cigales

reviews.text: Picked this hotel because of the great reviews on Trip Advisor and we were not disappointed. Smart hotel with decent sized rooms and air conditioning (a life saver!). Good access with stairs that are not steep, and a lift.
reviews.title: Fab hotel in great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff were lovely. Very helpful and friendly. Leaflets in the hotel were all in French but Tourist Office is not too far.
reviews.title: Very disappointed

likes.liked: — The position down a quiet road and fairly near to seafront

reviews.text: Location is great, just a few minutes walk to the Promenade and an easy walk to the station (about 15 minutes). Hotel is close enough to the restaurants and bars for them to be handy without it being too noisy. There is a grocery store a few seconds from the hotel along with a lovely Patisserie a short distance further. Nearby facilities are very good...internet, launderette, shopping, all nearby.
reviews.title: Very Nice Family Stay

reviews.text: Not a fan of travelling on buses with suitcases, but in this instance it is such a short and direct trip that it is no trouble at all and cheaper than taking a taxi.

reviews.text: Les Cigales is convenient for the Promenade, Rail Station, shopping, and main restaurant area. We stayed for 5 nights in a first floor front room which was enormous.

reviews.text: Bicycle hire, internet and Boulangerie are on the same block. There is WiFi in the hotel if that means anything to anyone !
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed two nights here in October, at the end of a trip through Provence. It was perfectly as advertised: clean, safe, fantastically convenient location, helpful staff. The only complaint was that there was no internet computer available (though wireless was available). Would definitely stay here again, if only for the combination of location/price.
reviews.title: Great bargain in Nice

reviews.text: Excellent small hotel in the centre of Nice The hotel is 5 minutes walk from the sea and is coveniently located for public transport and the main shopping areas. The hotel is spotlessly clean
